binary.task: Discover the vulnerable target machine within the 192.168.6.0/24 subnet. Analyze the binary executable on your Kali machine to understand the vulnerability. Exploit the buffer overflow to redirect execution and retrieve the flag.

Discover the vulnerable target machine within the 192.168.6.0/24 subnet. Analyze the binary executable on your Kali machine to understand the vulnerability. Use format string vulnerability to leak stack protections, then exploit the buffer overflow to spawn a shell. Once you have the shell, read flag.txt to retrieve the flag.
binary.vulnerability: canary leak with format string and buffer overflow
